name: Lucas Interrogation
description:
This is a gripping visual novel about the world of the near future, about accepting the loss of a loved one, and about the uprising of robots.

You have to solve mini-puzzles and decide for yourself whether the main character, a scientist named Lucas, will save humanity or destroy it.

Controls:

  • Only left mouse button

This game was made for love. It was made by a team of passionate people. So if you enjoy Interrogating Lucas, please donate money to our team, so we can release a sequel to Lucas's story.

Development team:

  • Game Designer — Nikolai Gostiukhin
  • Unity Programmer — Max Skazochkin
  • 2D Artists — Vil Pankrushin, Olga Rudneva
  • English translation — Olga Rudneva
